form.official-title: To amend the Small Business Investment Incentive Act of 1980 to require an annual review by the Securities and Exchange Commission of the annual government-business forum on capital formation that is held pursuant to such Act.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Small Business Capital Formation Enhancement Act.

section.header: Annual review of government-business forum on capital formation
section.text: Section 503 of the Small Business Investment Incentive Act of 1980 (15 U.S.C. 80c–1) is amended by adding at the end the following:

paragraph.text: review the findings and recommendations of the forum; and
each time the forum submits a finding or recommendation to the Commission, promptly issue a public statement—

subparagraph.text: assessing the finding or recommendation of the forum; and
disclosing the action, if any, the Commission intends to take with respect to the finding or recommendation.

subsection.text: Nothing in this section shall require the Commission to agree to or act upon any finding or recommendation of the forum.
